cards.rules_text:
Menace
Whenever you sacrifice a noncreature artifact, target player loses X life, where X is the number of counters on that artifact.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control a noncreature artifact with three or more counters on it, proliferate.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put all of its counters onto target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

Other Alchemists you control have ward {2}.
Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, if it had counters on it, create a Potion token and put those counters on it.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other Alchemist you control. Activate only during your turn.

When this creature enters, create a Potion token with a +1/+1 counter on it. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters onto target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter or a menace counter on target Potion you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“How peculiar. I must take a bite... for science!”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When this creature enters, choose up to one other target permanent with counters on it. Then create a Potion token and move all the counters from the chosen permanent to that Potion. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters onto target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Whenever you sacrifice a Potion, scry 2. Then if that Potion had three or more counters on it, draw a card.
{U}, {T}: Create a Potion token with a +1/+1 counter on it. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters onto target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

When this creature enters, create two Potion tokens and put a lifelink counter on one and a deathtouch counter on the other. [i](They're artifacts with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters onto target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Whenever a permanent you control with a counter on it leaves the battlefield, this creature deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

When this creature enters, create a Potion token with a deathtouch counter on it. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters onto target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Whenever you lose life, put a +1/+1 counter on target Potion you control.
At the beginning of your end step, if you lost 3 or more life this turn, proliferate.

Counter target spell. It's controller loses 3 life and you draw a card.

cards.flavor_text: [i]From one unstable drop, the whole brew began to turn.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this creature enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a Potion token. Then, put a stun counter on up to one Potion you control.
Whenever one or more counters are put on a creature you don't control, its controller loses 1 life. If this is the second time this ability triggered this turn, target player discards a card.

When this creature enters, tap target creature, then create a Potion token with a Stun counter on it. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters onto target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
{U}, {T}: Put a stun counter on a Potion you control. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
